DOC.brief_summary: This study couple pursue vitro fertilization ( IVF ) preimplantation genetic screening ( PGS ) embryos achieve pregnancy . The objective clinical trial study effect mono-menotropins COS versus recombinant follicle stimulate hormone ( rFSH ) cleavage-stage blastocyst embryo quality IVF . Embryo quality parameter include conventional embryo grade , early embryo viability assessment ( Eeva ) time-lapse parameter , chromosomal aneuploidy rate PGS . This pilot study expect significantly contribute optimization treatment regimens stimulation protocol optimize embryo quality .
DOC.brief_title: Mono-menotropins Versus rFSH Protocol Embryo Quality
DOC.detailed_description: This propose study single-center , prospective , randomized experimental design . One-hundred woman age 21 38 ( inclusive ) pursue IVF treatment infertility preimplantation genetic screening ( PGS ) . Pre-medication All study patient take oral contraception pill ( OCP ) start day 2-4 menstrual cycle control ovarian stimulation ( COS ) start IVF , continue 21 day . Cycle preparation use oral contraceptive pill think important improve follicular homogeneity . Randomization Randomization patient Stimulation Group 1 ( Mono-Menotropin Protocol ) Stimulation Group 2 ( rFSH ) occur OCP start use computerized randomization program . Ovarian Stimulation Stimulation Group 1 : Mono-Menotropin Protocol Fifty patient undergo standard care COS IVF use Menopur ( Ferring , Parsippany , New Jersey ( NJ ) USA ) . Patients receive 300 IU Menopur inject subcutaneously daily first five day stimulation . Thereafter , Menopur may adjust ( optimize ovarian response patient 's physician ) 75 IU increment total 450 IU Menopur daily include day hCG trigger . Stimulation Group 2 : rFSH Protocol Fifty patient undergo standard care control ovarian stimulation ( COS ) IVF use Gonal-f ( EMD Serono , USA ) protocol . Patients receive 300 IU Gonal-f administer subcutaneously daily first five day stimulation . Thereafter , Gonal-f may adjust ( optimize ovarian response patient 's physician ) 75 IU increment total 450 IU daily include day hCG trigger . Menopur Gonal-f widely use control ovarian stimulation cycle development multiple follicle assist reproductive technology ( ART ) program . Luteinizing Hormone ( LH ) -surge Suppression Gonadotropin Releasing Hormone ( GnRH ) antagonist use suppress endogenous pituitary LH prevention premature LH surge . Patients receive 0.25 mg/day Ganirelix Acetate Cetroelix Acetate follicle size reach 12 mm continue include day hCG trigger . HCG Trigger Human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) use intramuscularly ( IM ) stimulation group induce oocyte maturation 36 hour prior oocyte retrieval procedure Cycle Monitoring Cycles monitor follicular ultrasound measurement serum estradiol concentration throughout ovarian stimulation . HCG give IM least three follicle reach diameter â‰¥17 mm . Egg retrieval conduct transvaginal ultrasound 36 h hCG administration . Insemination All mature oocytes intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) standard insemination achieve fertilization . Embryo Development Two-pronuclei ( 2pn ) embryo place Eeva dish fertilization check 16-18 hour post ICSI . To maintain continuous uninterrupted image process day 1 day 3 , medium change dish removal incubator permit . On day 3 , image stop routine embryo grading perform accord Society Assisted Reproductive Technology ( SART ) standard . Cell number quality score base symmetry cell percent fragmentation record . Embryos track individually . Software automatically measure cell division timing provide quantitative information regard embryo development . Embryo grade day 5 perform accord standard operating procedure . Blastocysts biopsied day 5 6 . Biopsies send genetics laboratory ( Reprogenetics , New Jersey ) aCGH euploidy testing . Biopsied blastocysts vitrified future frozen embryo transfer ( FET ) cycle/s , euploid blastocyst/s correct number chromosome thaw transfer back uterus attempt achieve pregnancy . Abnormal embryo ( aneuploidy embryo incorrect number chromosome ) may donate research discard .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo IVF attempt achieve pregnancy . Day 24 Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) < 10 IU/ml , LH < 12 IU/ml , estradiol < 50 pg/ml day 24 menstrual cycle Antimullerian Hormone > 1.5 Between 10 20 basal antral follicle day 24 menstrual cycle Body weight > 50 kg , BMI > 18 < 32 kg/m2 Smokers Polycystic ovarian disease Endometriosis great Stage I Testicular aspirated sperm Preimplantation Genetic Diagnosis ( PGD ) single gene disorder Preimplantation Genetic Screening ( PGS ) banking cycle Donor Egg Cycles
